head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ARONSON, ZOLA A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ARONSON, ZOLA A.

block.p: ARONSON-Zola A. On October 15, 2000. Husband of Jeanne (nee Rubenstone). Father of Emily A. Ross, Theodore Aronson and Miriam (Merry) Aronson. Also survived by three grandchildren. Relatives and friends are invited to a memorial service Wednesday, 12 Noon at the late residence. Inquiries Joseph Levine & Son, www.levinefuneral.com
